SEARCH
Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller.CategoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${app.endpoint.categories}") @Validated public class CategoryController extends Object
REST controller for managing categories. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on categories.

Annotations: - @AllArgsConstructor: Generates a constructor with 1 parameter for each field in the class. - @RestController: Indicates that this class is a REST controller. - @RequestMapping: Specifies the base URL for all endpoints in this controller. - @Validated: Enables validation for the controller.

Methods: - getAllCategories(String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves all categories with pagination. - getCategoriesByNameContaining(String name, String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves categories by name containing a string with pagination. - getCategoryById(String id): Retrieves a category by its ID. - getCategoryByName(String name): Retrieves a category by its name, case insensitive. - createCategory(CategoryDto categoryDto): Creates a new category. - createCategories(Flux categories): Creates multiple categories. - deleteCategoryById(String id): Deletes a category by its ID. - deleteAllCategories(): Deletes all categories.

See Also:

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CategoryDto>> getAllCategories(@RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves all categories with pagination.
      Parameters:
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of CategoryDto objects.

    • getCategoriesByNameContaining

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.by-name}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CategoryDto>> getCategoriesByNameContaining(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves categories by name containing a string with pagination.
      Parameters:
      name - The string to search for within category names.
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of CategoryDto objects.

    • deleteCategoryById

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.path-variable-id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> deleteCategoryById(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to delete.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a message indicating the category has been deleted, or an error if not found.

    • deleteAllCategories

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.all}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> deleteAllCategories()
      Deletes all categories.
      Returns:
      A Mono indicating completion of the deletion process.
